name: Evil?
description:
It's my submission for BenBonk Game Jam #3. Theme: "Two Sides" . Made in 1,5 day.

What is it?

It's game about changing your personality. When slider in the bottom changes, everything change. You either become good or evil person. You show your both sides

How to play?

Avoid enemies when board is black and go towards them when board is white. You can also go into power up that spawn and they can either help you or not. 

In order to win you have do defeat enough enemies, so that red bar at the top will go to 0. If you get hit by enemy while being on evil side (black board) your score will decrease.

Controls

Mouse    ->    movement

LMB/RMB    ->    boost (you can boost yourself, but bottom slider will slow down)

Programs I've used

  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • BFXR
WARNING Game has flashing elements so it can cause epilepsy!!!

Hope you'll like it!
